name: Retro Sports Games Summer Edition
description:
Return to the 80s and experience the game
which have cost you all nerves in the past.
Retro Sport Games is coming with currently five disciplines.

*100m Sprint - Time is running! Only you can get the world record.

*Long jump - Only the sand stands between you and the best.
Find the right bounce and angle to reach a good distance.

*100m Freestyle - Swim for the gold medal!

*Javelin - Throw the spear as far as you can!

*Pole Vault - How high do you make it over the bar with the staff ?!

Have fun!
The dapion team
